name: My Constellation
blurb: A visualisation of the Dijkstra Algorithm in the form of an 8-Bit starry night sky.
description: This is a visualisation of the Dijkstra Algorithm in the form of an 8-Bit starry night sky.

images.caption: Screenshot of web and mobile gameplay

name: memory game
blurb: Match all the cards to win!
description: This is my memory game, click on any two cards to flip them around. If it's a match then they will stay flipped over, otherwise they will flip back. Once you have all the cards face up, you win!

images.caption: Screenshot of web and mobile gameplay
Screenshot of web and mobile gameplay
Screenshot of web and mobile gameplay

name: Dinoland
description: DinoLand is a platform where users can create a collection of their own dinosaur characters, and dress them up in a variety of accessories! With your fresh new characters, play the in built game to earn more coins, so you can change up their fresh looks!

name: Greenify
blurb: Rent your pot plants out to a loving community, or search for a new pot plant to join your home for a while.
description: A React app that allows will Greenify your life! Rent your pot plants out to a loving community, or search for a new pot plant to join your home for a while.

name: News App
blurb: Scrollable feed from a variety of news sources.
description: This is a news website that compiles articles from a large variety of news sources into the one place. The user is able to filter the sources based on search query, news source and date.

name: Blog Site
description: This is a simple blog platform I have built using javascript, HTML/CSS, and firebase.

name: Maze
blurb: A depth first search maze generator.
description: A maze made with javascript and p5.
